## Random.int() method

Generates a uniformly-distributed integer between 0 (inclusive) and `max` (exclusive).

**Signature:**

```typescript
int(max: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  max | number | The generated number will be less than this value. |

**Returns:**

number
